p: Starting from compound 1 (0.200 g, 1.22× 10 −3 mol) and using 1-bromopropane (0.12 mL, 1.34 × 10 −3 mol), compound 2a was obtained as a light yellow oil (0.224 g, 89% yield). R f = 0.67 (ethyl acetate/light petroleum = 1:10). 1H NMR (CDCl 3, 400 MHz): δ H = 1.06 (3H, t, J = 7.6 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 3), 1.88 (2H, sext, J = 7.2 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 3), 3.35 (2H, d, J = 6.8 Hz, CH 2Ph), 3.87 (3H, s, OCH 3), 3.97 (2H, t, J = 7.2 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 3), 5.07–5.14 (2H, m, CH=CH 2), 5.94–6.04 (1H, m, CH=CH2), 6.72–6.74 (2H, m, H-3 and H-5), 6.83 (1H, d, J = 8.0 Hz, H-6) ppm. 13C NMR (CDCl 3, 100.6 MHz): δ C = 10.23 (OCH 2CH 2CH 3), 22.36 (OCH 2CH 2CH 3), 39.60 (CH 2Ph), 55.69 (OCH 3), 70.44 (OCH 2CH 2CH 3), 112.24 (C-3), 113.06 (C-6), 115.30 (CH=CH 2), 120.25 (C-5), 132.44 (C-4), 137.51 (CH=CH 2), 146.76 (C-1), 149.23 (C-2) ppm. HRMS: m/z (ESI) calculated for C 13H 19O 2 [M+1] + = 207.1380; found = 207.1381.
